pub.section: asasa MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide Computer 36.95 The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

chapter.heading: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
chapter.footnote: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
